pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, February 10, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make a virtual announcement with Minister of Infrastructure and Communities Catherine McKenna, Minister of Environment and Climate Change Jonathan Wilkinson, Chair of the Canada Infrastructure Bank Tamara Vrooman, and Mayor of Edmonton Don Iveson. A media availability will follow.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual roundtable with the Federation of Canadian Municipalities’ Big City Mayors’ Caucus.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
